titleStmt.title: A pindarick poem on the Royal Navy most humbly dedicated to Their August Majesties, K. William, and Q. Mary / written by Mr. Durfey.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Randall Taylor,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Reissued in 1692, with cancel t.p.: A pindarick poem upon the fleet.
